title: Area Sales Representative Job at BIC Nigeria
content:
BIC® products are known and appreciated all over the world for their quality, their affordability and ease of use. The ballpoint pen, the pocket lighter, the one-piece shaver are all part of the daily lives of millions of consumers. These products make BIC® one of the best known international brands, present in 3.2 million retail outlets, in more than 160 countries. As we explore the tremendous opportunities ahead, we have a need for dedicated and dynamic employees to help build our team.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Area Sales Representative - Lagos IV
Job ID: 6657
Job Location: Lagos
Employment type: Full-time
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Main Responsibilities / Tasks


	Generate sales order and ensure delivery of products in the assigned sales areas and outlets
	Efficient retail redistribution of all LSNL/BIC products and effective coverage of relevant outlets in the assigned sales areas
	Regularly review of performance with the regional managers and customers in line with agreed target.
	Develop coverage Plan for the territory.
	Seek new sales opportunities within designated sales areas.
	Flawless implementation of SFA and other projects in sales areas.
	Flawless promotion execution and POSM deployment


Key Performance Indicators


	Achieving sales targets; Volume and Value
	Achieves coverage plan and number of new outlets listing
	Frequency of orders and cash collection
	Speed to shelf and high impact visibility
	Strong Numeric and Weighted Distribution of LSNL/BIC products in region.


Complex Criteria
Professional skills:


	R - Business and results oriented with proven negotiation skills
	R - Able to identify new sales opportunities
	D - Understand needs of customers and provide solution lead
	R - Hard working, rigorous, well organized and able to work autonomously
	R - Ability to complete assigned task within a short period of time
	D - Analytic, accurate and quick interpretation of figures


 Personal skills:


	R - A self-starter, working under their own initiative... and a completer/finisher
	R - Ability to analyze and provide clear recommendations
	R - Good communication skills (writing & verbal)
	R - Build strong relationships with both key external and internal customers
	R - Energy and passion for achievement of own commitments and delivering company objectives
	D - Able to influence and persuade others to take a specific course of action

title: Administrative Officer Job at Handyman Daige Properties
content:
Handyman Daige Properties is a private company in Abuja offering real estate development services. We prioritize delivering customized homes that meet our clients requirements.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer

Job Location: Wuse 2, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	He will be responsible for overseeing and supervising the day-to-day office management, including facility management, travel management, logistics, office procurement and fleet management.
	He is to report to General Manager General Services


Core Responsibilities and Key Result Areas


	Ensuring that the office is conducive for work and all office equipment are functioning optimally.
	Ensure that internal communications channels(CUG) are functional
	Store/Inventory Management
	Manage meeting rooms, and ensure proper meeting rooms are set up before any meeting
	Maintain and manage office generator fueling, servicing, etc.
	Liaises with the company’s chief security officer to ensure safety of staff and assets within the premises
	Maintaining office inventory
	Coordinate Drivers
	Manage all vehicle maintenance and fueling
	Ensure office cleanliness
	Cake and birthday Celebration
	Other assigned responsibilities/duties


Facility Management:


	Ensure that all utilities (power, water, internet, etc.) are available functional.
	Ensure all utility bills are promptly paid .
	Ensure prompt payment of rents and service fees .
	Liaising with External Facility Managers, where applicable .
	Ensure prompt payment of government levies.


Travel Management:


	Ensure cost effective purchase of travel tickets for directors, staff and partners, where applicable .
	Ensure accurate management of petrol issuance and reconciliation with petrol vendor
	Handling of hotel bookings for directors, staff and partners, where applicable .
	Processing of travel visas for staff and partners, where applicable .
	Transportation and Logistics .
	Ensure proper fleet Management of the company vehicles .
	Handling of airport meet and greet activities .
	Handling of local road trip for directors, staff and partners of the company
	Provision of logistics support for corporate event.


Key Performance Indicators


	Cost effective management of company’s fixed asset.
	Timely resolution of office facility issues .
	Efficient handling of events, protocol and logistical arrangements.
	Efficient and effective handling of petrol reconciliation with vendor


Qualifications
Educational Qualifications


	A Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration or any Social Sciences related discipline.
	Must be proficient with MS Office (word, excel and PowerPoint)


Experience Qualifications:


	Minimum of 5 years of working experience in an administrative/procurement related role.


Competencies
Knowledge:


	Understanding of relevant procurement processes and policy .
	Understanding of facility management procedures and policies .
	Knowledge of vendor management and negotiation .
	Understanding of hotel and air ticketing booking processes .
	Understanding of fleet management principles.


Technical Competencies:


	Demonstrates expertise in procurement processes and procedure.
	Demonstrates expertise in Budget and cost management
	Excellent written and oral communications skills
	Excellent organisational and coordination skills
	Excellent analytical skills .
	Demonstrates expertise in handing of facility management
	Demonstrates expertise in fleet management Demonstrates expertise in hotel booking and air ticketing procedures.


Behavioural Competencies:


	Leadership ability
	Problem-Solving/Decision making ability .
	Confidentiality and discretion .
	Multi-tasking ability .
	Sound Practical Judgment .
	Excellent time management .
	Deadline-driven 
	Resilience and Tenacity 
	Integrity and proactiveness
	Strong communication skills 
	Conflict management 
	Responsiveness 
	Industry Knowledge.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: victoria.negedu@handymandaige.com using Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Electrical Graduate Trainee (Female) Job at Catalyst Path Consulting
content:
Catalyst Path Consulting is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Graduate Trainee (Female)
Job Location: Gujeni, Kaduna
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for a motivated and talented Electrical Graduate Trainee to join our team in Kaduna.
	This role is designed to provide recent graduates with hands-on experience and professional development in electrical engineering.
	The ideal candidate will be eager to learn, adaptable, and passionate about advancing their skills in a dynamic environment.


Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Assist in the design, installation, testing, and maintenance of electrical systems.
	Support senior engineers in troubleshooting and resolving technical issues.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals.
	Participate in project planning, execution, and documentation.
	Conduct research and stay updated on industry trends, standards, and innovations.
	Ensure compliance with safety regulations and company policies.
	Perform other duties as assigned to enhance learning and skill development.

	Bachelor's Degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field.

	Basic understanding of electrical systems, circuits, and components.
	Proficiency in using electrical design software and tools is an advantage.
	Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
	Willingness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced environment.
	Attention to detail and a commitment to safety and quality.


Benefits


	Structured training and mentorship.
	Career growth opportunities.
	Exposure to real-world engineering projects.
	Supportive and inclusive work environment.


Method of Application

title: Junior Account Officer - Payable Job at Jtechtrade
content:
Jtechtrade is an online financial service provider . The Dream was birthed in year 2018 but Jtechtrade became a reality in 2019 and ever since then we have digital financial assets to both Merchants and Users of our platform and gaining a vast knowledge and experience on how the Digital space has paved way for a digital financial revolution. Our platform is designed with our Users in mind, it has a high anti-cyber security technology system making it safe and secured which also makes our payment system fast and reliable.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Junior Account Officer - Payable
Job Location: Amuwo Odofin, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Summary


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and organized Junior Accounts Officer to join our finance team. 
	The primary responsibility of this role will be managing accounts payable activities, ensuring timely and accurate processing of invoices.


Key Responsibilities


	Review, verify, and process invoices for payment in accordance with company policies.
	Prepare and execute payment runs, ensuring timely payments to suppliers.
	Maintain accurate records of all accounts payable transactions and ensure all documentation is complete and compliant.
	Assist in the reconciliation of accounts payable ledger with statements and internal records.
	Prepare accounts payable reports and summaries for management review.
	Provide necessary documentation and support during internal and external audits.


Qualifications


	Degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or a related field is preferred.
	Strong numerical and analytical skills with attention to detail.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (especially Excel) and familiarity with accounting software.
	Must be staying in close proximity to Festac Town, Amuwo Odofin.


Salary
N105,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and Cover Letter to: jtechtradecareers@outlook.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Digital Marketer Job at Vi-M Professional Solutions
content:
Vi-M Professional Solutions is a dynamic and innovative multidisciplinary professional services firm based in Nigeria. We specialize in tax, audit and assurance, business advisory, market entry services, HR and payroll outsourcing, immigration consulting, and digital transformation solutions, including tax technology development. 
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



At Vi-M, we are committed to delivering exceptional value to businesses and individuals by combining deep industry knowledge with technology-driven strategies. Our team comprises seasoned professionals with Big 4 backgrounds, and we have proudly served multinational companies, regulatory bodies, startups, and SMEs across a wide range of sectors, including trading, telecoms, fintech, manufacturing, real estate, healthcare, hospitality and professional services. We value integrity, excellence, client commitment, and continuous innovation. Joining Vi-M means being part of a collaborative environment where your expertise will help shape the future of business support services in Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketer
Job Location: Okota - Isolo, Lagos (Hybrid or Remote)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Digital Marketer will drive Vi-M’s online brand visibility and business lead generation through creative digital campaigns, SEO, and content marketing strategies.
	This role blends creativity with performance marketing and is key to business growth.


Key Responsibilities


	Design and execute multichannel digital campaigns (LinkedIn, Instagram, X/Twitter, Facebook).
	Create and manage original SEO-friendly content (blogs, videos, infographics, and newsletters).
	Plan and manage paid ad campaigns (Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Meta).
	Track digital KPIs and generate performance reports using tools like Google Analytics.
	Optimize website and landing pages for user engagement and lead capture.
	Collaborate with consulting teams to promote service offerings through storytelling and campaigns.
	Stay informed on the latest digital trends and tools.


Requirements


	B.Sc. in Marketing, Mass Communication, or related field.
	Minimum 3 years of experience in digital marketing (preferably in a professional services setting).
	Proficiency in tools like Canva, Meta Business Suite, Mailchimp, Google Analytics, and SEO platforms.
	Strong visual and copywriting skills.
	Knowledge of lead funnels, audience targeting, and remarketing.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Recruitment@vi-m.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
